welcome.text: Autobot is a simple bot that currently only handles conference room bookings. Suggestions for features and functionality are welcome.

attachments.title: Bugs reports here!
attachments.text: If the bots bugs out, please drop a DM with the issue.

attachments.title: Github link(Hosting on personal github for now)
attachments.text: The core of the bot is cloned from another slack tutorial bot. Feel free to modify the current code and improve it.
